snippet: New York City Audubon's director of conservation, Susan Elbin, is fielding your questions about birds of prey in the city as we celebrate Hawk Cam 2012's opening week. In her first set of answers, a primer on rat poison and the difference between...
abstract: New York City Audubon's director of conservation, Susan Elbin, is fielding your questions about birds of prey in the city as we celebrate Hawk Cam 2012's opening week. In her first set of answers, a primer on rat poison and the difference between whiffling and kettling (who knew?).

headline.main: Answers to Questions About Raptors, Part 1
